title: Concierge Planned Maintenance
desc: Our Planned Maintenance program is the foundation of the Concierge experience. Each month our technicians inspect, clean, and calibrate your equipment to keep it in peak condition.

title: Non Warranty Equipment Repair Work
desc: For equipment outside the warranty period, our technicians provide fast, reliable repairs backed by service level agreements that match your operational needs.

title: Warranty Facilitation From Manufacturer
desc: We handle the warranty process from start to finish, including manufacturer communication, parts orders, and claim tracking. Every step is documented in the platform.

title: Equipment Relocation
services: Across the room or across town
desc: Whether moving equipment across the room or across town, we handle it safely and efficiently.

title: Equipment Delivery and Installation
desc: Professional delivery and setup for any size facility. Each installation includes testing, calibration, and customer verification. Our job is not complete until you are completely satisfied.

title: Equipment Extraction
desc: We provide certified extraction and recycling for retired assets, with full documentation for your records.

title: Facility Design & Planning
desc: Professional gym layout and design services to maximize your space efficiency and member experience.

title: Equipment Financing Solutions
desc: Affordable financing solutions to help you acquire top-quality gym equipment.

title: Inventory Management System
desc: Keep track of all your gym assets and maintenance schedules in one centralized system.

title: Safety Compliance & Inspections
desc: Ensure your gym meets all safety standards and regulatory requirements.

title: Digital Fitness Solutions
desc: Modern digital solutions to enhance your members' fitness journey and engagement.

title: Equipment Upgrades & Modernization
desc: Keep your gym current with the latest equipment upgrades and modernization services.

title: Facility Cleaning & Sanitation
desc: Professional cleaning and sanitation services to maintain a healthy gym environment.

title: Custom Service Packages
desc: Create a service package that perfectly fits your gym's unique needs and budget.

title: Free Initial Consultation
desc: Get expert advice and comprehensive assessment of your gym's needs at no cost.

title: 24/7 Emergency Support
desc: Immediate assistance whenever you need it with our 24/7 emergency support services.

title: Performance Analytics & Reporting
desc: Data-driven insights to optimize your gym operations and equipment performance.

title: Quality Assurance Programs
desc: Comprehensive quality assurance to ensure your equipment performs at its best.

title: Equipment Relocation and Extraction
desc: Safe, efficient moves and certified extraction for outdated equipment. Every job is logged and documented for transparency and environmental responsibility.

title: Market Research & Analysis
desc: Data-driven market research to help you make informed decisions about your gym equipment investments.

title: Staff Review and Approve
desc: Requests are routed to gym staff for review and approval. Staff can also create new service requests through mobile or web.

title: Equipment Database System
desc: Centralized equipment database system with QR codes enabling quick service request submission and asset management for tracking.

title: We will Handle the Rest
desc: Once approved the FRC platform automatically dispatches the right technician tracks progress and provides live updates throughout the process.

title: Track and Review Services
desc: All service history costs and completion details are available in your dashboard providing full visibility into every piece of equipment.

title: Invoice Management
desc: Complete invoice management with billable tracking Net 10 terms and monthly reporting per gym with subscription options for service insights.

title: Members Report Issues
desc: Members scan a QR code on any piece of equipment and submit a quick complaint through their phone for instant service request.

title: Multi-Brand Equipment Support
desc: Expert support for all major fitness equipment brands under one service provider.

title: Preventive Maintenance Programs
desc: Proactive maintenance programs to extend equipment life and prevent costly breakdowns.

title: Comprehensive Service Packages
desc: Complete service packages offering the best value and peace of mind for your gym operations.
